attributes.action: For there to be a national Bank Holiday (12th) if England win Euro 2020!
attributes.background: The government should approve a national Bank Holiday if the national team win the Euro 2020 championships - would be a day that will go down in history and should be celebrated country wide.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
